00053             function                __construct()
00054             {
00055                   try
00056                   {
00057                         $this->GroupAccess = get_package( 'permit::group_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00058                         $this->BlockParameters = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00059                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00060                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00061                   }

00102             function                compile_group_select( $MasterId , $MasterType , $GroupList , $Class )
00103             {
00104                   try
00105                   {
00106                         $MasterId = $this->Security->get( $MasterId , 'integer' );
00107                         $MasterType = $this->Security->get( $MasterType , 'command' );
00108                         $GroupList = $this->Security->get( $GroupList , 'command' );
00109                         
00110                         $ObjectGroupList = $this->GroupAccess->get_groups_for_object( $MasterId , $MasterType );
00111                         $GroupName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'group_name' , 'command' , false );
00112                         $Code = '';
00113                         
00114                         foreach( $GroupList as $i => $GroupTitle )
00115                         {
00116                               $Selected = ( $GroupName === false )
00117                                     ? ( in_array( $GroupTitle , $ObjectGroupList ) ? ' selected' : '' )
00118                                     : ( $GroupName == $GroupTitle ? ' selected' : '' );
00119 
00120                               $Code .= "<option value=\"$GroupTitle\"$Selected>{lang:$GroupTitle}";
00121                         }
00122                         return( 
00123                               "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"group_list\" value=\"".implode( ',' , $GroupList ).
00124                               "\"><select class=\"$Class\" name=\"group_name\">$Code</select>"
00125                         );
00126                   }
00127                   catch( Exception $e )
00128                   {
00129                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00130                   }
00131             }
00132             
00159             function                process_group_select( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00160             {
00161                   try
00162                   {
00163                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'group_select' ) ; )
00164                         {
00165                               $this->BlockParameters->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00166                               
00167                               $MasterId = $this->BlockParameters->get_setting( 'master_id' );
00168                               $MasterType = $this->BlockParameters->get_setting( 'master_type' );
00169                               $GroupList = explode( ',' , $this->BlockParameters->get_setting( 'group_list' ) );
00170                               $Class = $this->BlockParameters->get_setting( 'class' , 'flat' );
00171                               
00172                               $Code = $this->compile_group_select( $MasterId , $MasterType , $GroupList , $Class );
00173                               
00174                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{group_select:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
00175                               
00176                               $Changed = true;
00177                         }
00178 
00179                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00180                   }
00181                   catch( Exception $e )
00182                   {
00183                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00184                   }
00185             }
00186 
00217             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00218             {
00219                   try
00220                   {
00221                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed )= $this->process_group_select( $ProcessingString , $Changed );
00222                         
00223                         return( $ProcessingString );
00224                   }
00225                   catch( Exception $e )
00226                   {
00227                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
